DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine beneficial effect Danggui Buxue Tang blood biochemical parameter male recreational runner .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Danggui Buxue Tang Blood Biochemical Parameters Male Recreational Runners
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Male recreational runner would recruit community website email . After completely introduce study , participant would request sign inform consent . 2 . The participant would perform maximal oxygen consumption test prior supplementation . The participant would supplement either Danggui Buxue Tang placebo week perform 13-km run . A total 4 time blood collection ( supplementation , immediate running , 1 day 3 day run ) would perform evaluate effect Danggui Buxue Tang blood biochemical parameter .
DOC.criteria: The participant experience finish 10km run without experience attend marathon run . Participants suffer anemia ( Hb < 13 g/dL ) , take usual supplement , medication , alcohol feeling comfortable .
